title.rendered: AFN REAR STEP BAR TO SUIT ISUZU D-MAX (2012 – 2016)

content.rendered:
AFN Rear Step Bar to suit Isuzu D-MAX (2012 – 2016) is available now at Automax 4×4!

AFN rear step bar to suit Isuzu D-MAX (2012 – 2016) includes;

  • Side Protection
  • Built-in Towbar
  • Aluminum Checkered Plate Step Cover
  • Rated Recovery Points
  • Hi-Lift Jack Points
  • Matte Black Powder Coated

Click here to check out our great range of products suited to your Isuzu D-MAX!

For more 4×4 inspiration follow us on Instagram and Facebook

excerpt.rendered: AFN rear step bar to suit your Isuzu D-MAX (2012 – 2016 models) is currently available in store or online at Automax 4×4!
